content.rendered:
Directed by Sameer Saxena

Written by Biswapati Sarkar

Star Jitendra Kumar(Meenu Narang). Arushi Sharma(Disha Chhabra). Jaaved Jaaferi(Pradeep Narang (as Javed Jaffrey)). Raksha Panwar(Deepa). Raj Qushal(Lalli). Sandeep Shikhar(Ram Swaroop). Ajay Mehra(Ikrar). Imran Rashid(Madan). Shubham Bagari(Sanju). Rukshar Dhillon(Iccha). Shayank Shukla(Hemu). Shoan Zagade(Riju). Manoj Joshi(Jaadugar Chhabra). Rajiv Nema(Nema / Commentator). Sant Ranjan(Gangwal). Ajeet Singh Palawat(Dilip). Ganesh Deokar(Prashant 2). Purnendu Bhattacharya(Avinash Ji)

Language Hindi

Producers Zaid Ali. Ankita Batra. Vikesh Bhutani. Deeya Choudhary. Navit Dutt. Amit Golani. Shasham Jain. Saurabh Khanna. Sidhu Manpreet. Varun Panjwani. Biswapati Sarkar. Shujaat Saudagar. Sameer Saxena. Shubh Shivdasani

Production Chalkboard Entertainment. Netflix. Posham Pa Pictures
